title: ✨ Feature: Add attendance analytics dashboard
body:
## ✨ Feature Request

### Summary
Add a comprehensive analytics dashboard for tracking student attendance patterns and trends.

### User Story
As a **Teacher/Administrator**, I want to view attendance analytics so that I can identify attendance patterns and take appropriate actions for students with poor attendance.

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Display overall attendance statistics (percentage, trends)
- [ ] Show individual student attendance records
- [ ] Generate attendance reports by date range
- [ ] Visualize attendance data with charts and graphs
- [ ] Export attendance data to CSV/Excel
- [ ] Filter attendance by course, student, or time period

### Technical Requirements
- Use Chart.js or similar library for data visualization
- Implement CQRS pattern for attendance queries
- Add new analytics controllers in API layer
- Create responsive UI components for dashboard

### Mockups/Design
- Dashboard should display key metrics prominently
- Use card-based layout for different analytics sections
- Include date range picker for filtering

### Priority
Medium

### Labels
feature, analytics, attendance, dashboard, medium-priority
